family.title: UK repeals presumption of parental contact in abuse cases
family.summary: Courts prioritize child safety over automatic parental involvement; supporters say it protects victims, critics worry about misuse to deny contact.

family.title: California expands paid family leave to 90% wage replacement
family.summary: Higher benefits for bonding/caregiving ease family burdens but raise questions on cost as state taxes climb.

family.title: WA conservatives challenge rewrite of parental-rights law
family.summary: Suit targets expansions in student privacy and gender-care access, arguing parents are cut out of key medical decisions.

family.title: Trump team urges states to review LGBTQ+ foster rules
family.summary: Push to roll back affirmation requirements sparks debate over foster youth protections vs. aligning with biological standards.

family.title: 24 GOP AGs back challenge to birthright citizenship
family.summary: Brief supports limiting automatic citizenship for children of undocumented parents, citing 14th Amendment interpretation.

family.title: Florida updates child support to reflect real costs
family.summary: New formulas factor daycare and extracurriculars—simplifying calculations but potentially raising obligations.

education.title: Elite universities reject Trump higher-ed compact
education.summary: Guidelines tying federal funds to neutrality on race/identity face pushback as curbs on academic freedom.

education.title: Project 2025 education blueprint ignites voucher debate
education.summary: Decentralization and school choice framed as parent empowerment; critics warn of weakened district systems.

education.title: Senate GOP presses White House to release stalled school aid
education.summary: Delays hit rural districts; Republicans seek streamlined delivery focused on skills rather than equity programs.

education.title: India–Nigeria IIT campus aims at AI & tech skills
education.summary: Cross-border training expands access but reignites “brain drain” concerns.

security.title: Bay Area ICE operations paused amid protests
security.summary: Planned enforcement draws demonstrations, highlighting friction between federal priorities and sanctuary policies.

security.title: Border apprehensions fall to 50-year low
security.summary: Reported 238k crossings credited to stricter measures; humanitarian impacts remain a concern.

security.title: Facial recognition expanded at U.S. ports
security.summary: Biometric checks target overstay risk; privacy advocates question safeguards.

security.title: Drug-boat strikes proceed without war declaration
security.summary: Operations against fentanyl traffickers in the Caribbean test executive authority and congressional oversight.

security.title: Police warn on Venezuelan gang rumors
security.summary: Reports of Tren de Aragua plotting attacks stoke fears and debate over policy responses.

america.title: E. Jean Carroll’s $83M verdict upheld on appeal
america.summary: Court affirms defamation award for 2019 comments; no new trial ordered.

america.title: AFPI slams safety-net spending for non-citizens
america.summary: Think tank urges redirecting emergency resources toward citizens and border control.

america.title: H-1B overhaul framed as “citizens-first” hiring
america.summary: Proposed changes aim to curb outsourcing and prioritize U.S. workers in high-skill roles.

america.title: JPMorgan to allow crypto as mortgage collateral
america.summary: Banks move toward digital-asset collateralization marks a post-regulatory shift in consumer finance.

america.title: U.S. credit downgraded to AA- by Scope Ratings
america.summary: $38T federal debt, tariffs, and spending cited as drivers of the downgrade.

global.title: Venezuela saber-rattling divides Trump base
global.summary: Moves against drug routes revive intervention fatigue vs. border-first priorities.

global.title: Maduro deploys defenses as carrier nears
global.summary: Coastal alerts follow reported covert strikes on cartel facilities.

global.title: Machado backs U.S. pressure on Maduro
global.summary: Opposition leader supports accountability tied to trafficking networks.

global.title: All 32 NATO allies hit 2% spending
global.summary: Milestone reached; a smaller group aims for 3.5% target.

global.title: Milei advances Argentina privatizations
global.summary: Aggressive state-shrink agenda continues; markets watch deregulation pace.

journal.title: Who is Polymarket’s $28M “Trump whale”?
journal.summary: A French trader’s huge wager raises questions about prediction-market influence.

journal.title: Election whales reportedly net $85M
journal.summary: Blockchain-tracked profits spark debates on market integrity and regulation.

journal.title: Generational debt from policy traps
journal.summary: Critique of education/welfare incentives that funnel youth into loans and stagnation.

journal.title: Music AI and the end of authenticity?
journal.summary: Commercial AI songwriting raises questions about ownership, culture, and artist futures.
